description: This file defines the AttendanceRecord class, representing an attendance entry in a kindergarten management system. It includes fields for student ID, date, presence status, notes, and methods for serializing/deserializing to and from a Map.

classes.name: AttendanceRecord
classes.description: A data model representing a student's attendance record, including methods for serialization and deserialization.

methods.name: AttendanceRecord.fromMap
methods.description: Creates an AttendanceRecord instance from a Map<String, dynamic>, parsing fields appropriately.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the AttendanceRecord instance into a Map<String, dynamic> for storage or transfer.
